name: Twilio Barista Node.js
description: A Node.js application that allows users

LOGIN_USERNAME.description: Username to gain access to the service.

LOGIN_PASSWORD.description: Password to gain access to the service.

PUSHER_APP_KEY.description: App Key to identify with the Pusher Application
